## Source: CIBSE TM46 (2008) cross-referenced with Guide F Table 20.9
## Context: Ratio to split combined "gas/oil heating + DHW" into components
## Notes: TM46 provides separate heating and DHW benchmarks by activity type
building_type,building_type_name,heating_fraction,dhw_fraction,notes
1,"Cellular NV office",0.82,0.18,"TM46 office: heating 79 / DHW ~15-17 of combined 97"
2,"Open plan NV office",0.82,0.18,"Same office archetype split"
3,"Standard AC office",0.82,0.18,"Same office archetype split"
4,"Prestige AC office",0.82,0.18,"Same office archetype split"
5,"Distribution and storage",0.85,0.15,"Warehouse: minimal DHW"
6,"Light manufacturing",0.85,0.15,"Industrial: minimal DHW"
7,"Factory office",0.83,0.17,"Hybrid industrial/office"
8,"General manufacturing",0.88,0.12,"Heavy industrial: very low DHW"

sbem_epc_target_efficiencies.csv:
source,"SBEM Technical Manual v7.0.c (13 Dec 2023), Appendix B logic, p146-149"
system_type,intervention,target_efficiency,epc_code,notes
boiler_poor,High efficiency boiler,0.81,EPC-H1,Target for poor boilers (<0.70)
boiler_fair,Condensing boiler,0.89,EPC-H3,Target for fair boilers (0.70-0.88); gas/oil/LPG only
chiller,High efficiency chiller,2.5,EPC-C2,Target SSEER for fair/poor chillers
hw_standalone,High efficiency water heater,0.80,EPC-W1,Target for fair HW generators (0.70-0.79)
hw_system,Point of use DHW,0.75,EPC-W2,Target distribution efficiency for poor HWS
electric_heating_ashp,Consider ASHP,2.2,EPC-R5,Default iSBEM ASHP COP; triggered when elec heating COP<2
electric_heating_gshp,Consider GSHP,3.1,EPC-R1,GSHP target COP; triggered when elec heating COP<2
sbem_epc_thresholds.csv:
source,"SBEM Technical Manual v7.0.c (13 Dec 2023), Appendix B, p144-164"
end_use,metric,good_threshold,fair_threshold,poor_threshold,notes
heating,kWh/m2,Actual < Notional,Notional <= Actual < Typical,Actual >= Typical,Compared against Notional and Typical building
cooling,kWh/m2,Actual < 0.85 * Notional,0.85*Notional <= Actual < 1.5*Notional,Actual >= 1.5 * Notional,Compared against Notional building only; ignore virtual cooling
lighting,kWh/m2,Actual < Notional,Notional <= Actual < Typical,Actual >= Typical,Compared against Notional and Typical building
hot_water,kWh/m2,Actual < Notional,Notional <= Actual < Typical,Actual >= Typical,Compared against Notional and Typical building
auxiliary,kWh/m2,Actual < Notional,Notional <= Actual < Typical,Actual >= Typical,Compared against Notional and Typical building
heat_generator,efficiency,>0.88,0.70 to 0.88,<0.70,Boiler criterion set to 0.70 to classify defaults as poor
cold_generator,SSEER,>2.4,2.0 to 2.4,<2.0,
hw_generator_standalone,efficiency,>0.79,0.70 to 0.79,<0.70,Only when NOT provided by space heating boiler
duct_leakage,percentage,<5%,5% to <10%,>=10%,Applicable to ducted HVAC systems only
glazing,U-value W/m2K,<3.5,,>=3.5,Assumed single glazed if U>3.5; triggers EPC-E5 and EPC-E8
walls_solid,U-value W/m2K,<1.0,,>=1.0,Triggers EPC-E3
